alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 5:13PM CDT until March 24 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 512 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of West Crossett to near Huttig to 9 miles east of Farmerville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Crossett, West Crossett and Old Milo around 525 PM CDT. North Crossett and Fountain Hill around 530 PM CDT. Beekman around 535 PM CDT. Hamburg around 540 PM CDT. Berlin around 545 PM CDT. Wilmot and Snyder around 550 PM CDT. Montrose and Parkdale around 555 PM CDT. Portland around 600 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
